channel.title: Stabbing-scape Anitnull protecter must see
channel.description:
Credits for source 2% to Scobydoo 28% to me for editing it 30% to tutorials of silabsoft 40% to Figment for base ---------------------------------- Credits for client 20% to me for adding and editing 50% to blurrr for base 30% to bration for some but most of the models ------------------------------
Code: [Select] ((commands)) Player commands
::switch ::starter ::home (((((::fly)))) (((((::Jump)))) <----- Cool command lol (((((::jumpoff)))) ::wc ::yell ::food ::dance ::smith ::skills ::rep ::kbd ::mini ::dbmini ::afk ::back ::gsmini ::suggest Many more just do ::commands ~~~~~~ Mod commands
::kick ::notedbarrows ::az ::1hit (((((::mute *user*)))) <----- forgot to add to ::commands -.- (((((::unmute *user*)))) ::pring ::spec ::xrichie ::sweet ::modwear ::pure ::god ::alert ::mypk ::alert ~~~~~~~ Admin commands
::banuser ::unban ::pnpc ::pickup ::npc ::xteleto ::xteletome ::k0 ::xrichie ::god ::adminwear ~~~~~~~~ Owner commands
::ownerwear ::ipban ::staffmeeting ::z0r ::giveadmin ::givemod ::giveowner ::eat ::update ::demote Code: [Select] -------------------I Weed I's Custom Item Id List!-------------------- 9117 Black Mask 9118 Yellow Mask 9106 Null 10103 red Whip 10106 Gold whip 10105 Barrows Whip 10100 Orange whip 10101 Purple whip 10102 Unknown color whip 9091 NUll 10110 Gold Phat 10111 Grey Phat 10109 Orange phat 10117 Dragon Phat 10118 barrows phat 10116 rune Phat 10115 Addy phat 10114 Mith Phat 10113 Steel phat 10112 iron phat 10091 Black Santa Hat 10090 Purple Santa hat 10096 Gold santa hat 10094 Dragon Santa hat 10098 Blue santa hat 10097 barrows santa hat 10093 rune santa hat 10095 addy santa hat 10092 mith santa 1283 DILDO _----------------_ 15150 Summoning Skillcape 16600 Dragon platebody 15114 Ivandis Chainmail 15112 Ivandis Platelegs 15116 Ivandis Sheild 15111 Ivandis helm 15115 Ivandis boots 15113 Ivandis gauntlets 15117 Ivandis blade 15338 lava Chainmail 15339 lava Platelegs 15340 lava sheild 15343 lava helm 15341 lava boots 15342 lava gauntlets 15337 lava blade 8002 Dragon Claws 15603 Beautiful cape 15602 dragon cape 13665 Tri god warspear 13943 energy blades 14396 dragon pickaxe 11115 hidan's scythe 10011 Dragon kite shield (wing shield) 9999 dragon kite shield 10007 Dragon platebody 13459 blue lightsaber 13643 Statius warhammer What I have done in v4.1 ------------------- *fixed bugs, that was my objective of making this source. *Added ::jump ::jumpoff for players. *Server does contain syiblocker and parts of antinull *added new tele ::chill *added new shops
If anything if someone nulls you, server should reject most of the nulls. It should take a long time for someone to crash you.
Here are some pictures CLient!!! NOTE: NO New CLient for V4.1! --------------- D Claws and d plate, dildo, other stuff on picture!
Virus Scan
SOurce! ---------------------
Home created by I weed I
Train created by meh!
Moar shops! with models so DOWNLOAD CLIENT TO SEE THEM!
Skillcape Emote! (gfx's by i weed i)
Same old Barrows!
miniquest! got from silabsoft tuts
New 1v1!
FUnPK! Made by me!
Bash minigame, only way to get rares
SKills!
3rd age
pkbox!
New chill area
Kbd
Mini Created by i weed i
Darkbow Minigame! Not created by me
Aggressive Godwars! Created by i weed i
This is mylast source FOR SURE!, have fun, and here are teh links, I called v4 my last source but then it was buggy as shit.
--------------------------------------------------------- V4.1 download source link max combat= 126 - http://uppit.com/v/2RBMD9YD ----------------------------------------------------------- V4.1 download source link max combat= 255 - http://uppit.com/v/80E9G523 ------------------------------------------------- V4 Client DOwnload link - http://uppit.com/v/3R90X603
---------If your going to leach please give meh credits , and REPLY on topic moar.----- Thank you, I weed I.

item.title: Stabbing-scape Anitnull protecter must see
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

This seems pretty gay…
Anitnull? Too lazy to simply change it to Antinull?..

If anything if someone nulls you, server should reject [b]most[/b] of the nulls. It should take a long time for someone to crash you.

Most of them?
Shouldn’t it reject ALL of them?

Read full topic

ehhh… 5/10 People are ruining servers these days with all the customs. What ever happened to just plain runescape. Some customs are cool but people are really overdoing it lately… Other than that it’s ok.=) I suggest making a v5 with less customs
